test.name: การทดสอบการสั่งซื้อสินค้าของลูกค้าที่ลูกค้าชำระเงินสำเร็จ

kw.name: ค้นหาสินค้าและตรวจสอบการค้นหาว่าเป็นสินค้าที่ถูกต้องตามที่ค้นหา
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Balance Training Bicycle' into text field 'id=search-product-input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: กรอกข้อมูลการจัดส่ง
Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${customer} = {'name': 'พิสิษฐ์', 'surname': 'วนกิจรุ่งเรือง', 'address': '159/49 หมู่บ้านดลลชา ซอยสุขสวัสดิ์ 70', 'province': 'กรุงเทพมหานคร', 'district': 'เขตทุ่งครุ', 'sub_district': 'ทุ่งครุ', 'telephone': '062...
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'พิสิษฐ์' into text field 'id=shipping-form-first-name-input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'วนกิจรุ่งเรือง' into text field 'id=shipping-form-last-name-input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '159/49 หมู่บ้านดลลชา ซอยสุขสวัสดิ์ 70' into text field 'id=shipping-form-address-input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=shipping-form-province-select' by label กรุงเทพมหานคร.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=shipping-form-district-select' by label เขตทุ่งครุ.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=shipping-form-sub-district-select' by label ทุ่งครุ.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg: วนกิจรุ่งเรือง
159/49 หมู่บ้านดลลชา ซอยสุขสวัสดิ์ 70
กรุงเทพมหานคร
เขตทุ่งครุ

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
